content: amby axolotl no part of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed for profit items created with this pattern may be sold but must credit panchet studios abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring decrease decrease st stitch bl back loop single_crochet single_crochet fl front loop increase 2 single crochets in blo/flo back/front one stitch loop only ● decrease can be made visibly or invisibly ● flip project inside out as soon as possible © 2023 pan evers all rights reserved panchetstudio com pattern head row pattern st count 01 magic_ring 6sc 6 02 6inc 12 03 1sc increase * 6 18 04 increase 2sc * 6 24 05 3sc increase * 6 30 06 2sc increase 4sc increase * 5 2sc 36 07 5sc increase * 6 42 08 3sc increase 6sc increase * 5 3sc 48 09 7sc increase * 6 54 10-16 54sc 54 7 row 17 4sc decrease * 9 45 18 3sc decrease * 9 36 19 1sc decrease 2sc decrease * 8 1sc 27 20 1sc decrease * 9 18 21 9dec 9 smoosh head flat eyes go in middle row 11sts apart use arms to center eyes you should not fill the head until after you crochet arms ~row 30 - else it will be difficult to center and snap safety eyes do not cut yarn cont body 22 flo 9inc 18 © 2023 pan evers all rights reserved panchetstudio com 23-24 18sc 18 2 row 25 2sc increase * 6 24 26 arm arm 24 4sc blo 5sc 7sc blo 5sc 3sc 27 4sc 5sc thru flo of row 26 7sc 5sc thru 24 flo of row 26 3sc 28 4sc 5sc around unworked st of row 27 24 7sc 5sc around unworked st of row 27 3sc 29 5sc increase * 4 28 30 13sc increase * 2 30 31-34 30sc 30 4 row locate center of back place st marker crochet to st marker this is now the start of your row keep the beginning of the row in the center of the back due to variation in yarn and gauge you may need to shift the st marker forward by a single_crochet every few row do not count scs made to shift the st marker cont 35 2sc increase 4sc increase * 5 2sc 36 36 5sc increase * 6 42 count 6st before end of row 36 place new st marker b cont 37 6sc place 2nd st marker c single_crochet to 1 36 around inside before b 30sc ch6 1sc into space 42 around outside after c place st marker for new row in the st after c 38 30sc around outside blo 6sc * 2 1sc 42 around outside 39 around inside 2sc decrease 3sc decrease * 5 30 around inside 1sc into each chain 6sc 1sc © 2023 pan evers all rights reserved panchetstudio com 40 1sc decrease 2sc decrease * 5 4sc decrease 24 41 1sc decrease * 8 16 42 decrease * 8 8 fasten_off sew flo
